The claim is based on a post from smartm: com, which is an undated source.
The post from smartmindmag: com heavily borrows from a NASA report from June 2016 but stretches the truth.
The NASA report mentions the discovery o: labeled 2016 HO3, which appears to circle around Earth but is not considered a true moon.
Other news outlets covered the story mor: highlighting the nuances and clarifying that Earth does not have a new moon.
